Name: Time To Walk Alone
About the game: When you awoke, there was only darkness except voices from mother. And now you can see things with your sight after touching them. Find the way by death. Challenge to lots of traps. Explore the laboratory and escape. Time To Walk Alone is a hardcore platformer game. Basically, you can't see things before you touch it. Dive to blocks and traps. It's the only way to escape. Do not be afraid. Is it possible? Can you escape from laboratory? Stand yourself. Walk yourself. It's the time to walk alone.
